author: jukka
msg: Make LRUNodeIdCache synchronized and use the LinkedHashMap class instead of the LinkedMap from Commons Collections (LinkedHashMap supports access-ordering, which makes it better for a LRU map)

author: jukka
msg: Make BundleCache synchronized and use the LinkedHashMap class instead of the LinkedMap from Commons Collections (LinkedHashMap supports access-ordering, which makes it better for a LRU map)
